Contemporary Issues in Digital Marketing

This module seeks to strengthen student knowledge of contemporary issues challenging businesses across a range of business sectors. The module will provide learners with the theoretical knowledge to allow them to contextualise and better understand some of the key challenges facing their area of business specialism. Learners will be required to explore key texts, theories and ideas to help them to be able identity and critically evaluate the potential impacts these issues might cause to businesses in their chosen specialism.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identify and critically analyse contemporary issues in business management and practice 

+  Apply knowledge of business and management theory to critically analyse relevant contemporary issues in business and management and identify the potential impacts on their chosen area of specialism.

+  Reflect upon and assess how these contemporary issues might affect the careers and employability of learners
